14 PickPlaceBase::PickPlaceBase(Stage::pointer&& grasp_stage, const std::string& name, bool forward)
15  : SerialContainer(name) {
16  PropertyMap& p = properties();
17  p.declare<std::string>("object", "name of object to grasp");
18  p.declare<std::string>("eef", "end effector name");
19  p.declare<std::string>("eef_frame", "name of end effector frame");
20 
21  // internal properties (cannot be marked as such yet)
22  p.declare<std::string>("eef_group", "JMG of eef");
23  p.declare<std::string>("eef_parent_group", "JMG of eef's parent");
24 
25  cartesian_solver_ = std::make_shared<solvers::CartesianPath>();
26  int insertion_position = forward ? -1 : 0; // insert children at end / front, i.e. normal or reverse order
27 
28  auto init_ik_frame = [](const PropertyMap& other) -> boost::any {
29  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
30  const boost::any& frame = other.get("eef_frame");
31  if (frame.empty())
32  return boost::any();
33 
34  pose.header.frame_id = boost::any_cast<std::string>(frame);
35  pose.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
36  return pose;
37  };
38 
39  {
40  auto approach = std::make_unique<MoveRelative>(forward ? "approach object" : "retract", cartesian_solver_);
41  PropertyMap& p = approach->properties();
42  p.property("group").configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, "eef_parent_group");
43  p.property("ik_frame").configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, init_ik_frame);
44  p.set("marker_ns", std::string(forward ? "approach" : "retract"));
45  approach_stage_ = approach.get();
46  insert(std::move(approach), insertion_position);
47  }
48 
49  grasp_stage_ = grasp_stage.get();
50  grasp_stage->properties().configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, { "eef", "object" });
51  insert(std::move(grasp_stage), insertion_position);
52 
53  {
54  auto lift = std::make_unique<MoveRelative>(forward ? "lift object" : "place object", cartesian_solver_);
55  PropertyMap& p = lift->properties();
56  p.property("group").configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, "eef_parent_group");
57  p.property("ik_frame").configureInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, init_ik_frame);
58  p.set("marker_ns", std::string(forward ? "lift" : "place"));
59  lift_stage_ = lift.get();
60  insert(std::move(lift), insertion_position);
61  }
62 }
63 
64 void PickPlaceBase::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
65  // inherit properties from parent
66  PropertyMap* p = &properties();
67  p->performInitFrom(Stage::PARENT, parent()->properties());
68 
69  // init internal properties
70  const std::string& eef = p->get<std::string>("eef");
71  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = robot_model->getEndEffector(eef);
72  if (!jmg)
73  throw InitStageException(*this, "unknown end effector: " + eef);
74 
75  p->set<std::string>("eef_group", jmg->getName());
76  p->set<std::string>("eef_parent_group", jmg->getEndEffectorParentGroup().first);
77 
78  // propagate my properties to children (and do standard init)
79  SerialContainer::init(robot_model);
80 }
81 
82 void PickPlaceBase::setApproachRetract(const geometry_msgs::TwistStamped& motion, double min_distance,
83  double max_distance) {
84  auto& p = approach_stage_->properties();
85  p.set("direction", motion);
86  p.set("min_distance", min_distance);
87  p.set("max_distance", max_distance);
88 }

90 void PickPlaceBase::setLiftPlace(const geometry_msgs::TwistStamped& motion, double min_distance, double max_distance) {
91  auto& p = lift_stage_->properties();
92  p.set("direction", motion);
93  p.set("min_distance", min_distance);
94  p.set("max_distance", max_distance);
95 }

97 void PickPlaceBase::setLiftPlace(const std::map<std::string, double>& joints) {
98  auto& p = lift_stage_->properties();
99  p.set("joints", joints);
